attributes.action: Recognise the town of Wooton Bassett for its loyalty to who have lost their lives. The town should become  known as'Royal Wooton Bassett'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The act of rememberance is a solemn one and the town turns out in force, shops close, every time a soldier is repatriated. This is an exraordinary act on the part of this town who now represent the entire nations grief. The town should be permanently honoured for this

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
